$eref.description: active=usable and not expected to go away anytime soon, deprecated=can be used but is expected to go away in near future, disabled=cannot be used

___matches.description: Requires string field to match regular expression

___minimum.description: Minimum numeric value for fields of numeric type.

___required.description: Indicates if the field is required.  Defaults to 'false'.

___maximum.description: Maximum numeric value for fields of numeric type.

___minItems.description: Minimum number of items in an array field.

___minLength.description: Minimum length of a string field.

___maxLength.description: Maximum length of a string field.

___enum.description: Should set type of 'string' when using enum.  Value is a reference to an enum name in entityInfo.

___maxItems.description: Maximum number of items in an array field.

___update.description: Roles that can perform write update/save on this field.

___find.description: Roles that can perform find operations on this field.

___value.description: Unique value for this version of the entity

___extendVersions.description: The versions of this entity that this version extends from.  If there are more than one it implies that the versions were merged into this.

___changelog.description: Human readable summary of what changed from what was extended to this new version of the metadata or indication that it is the first version of an entity.
